content: {"name": "Mana Mobile Pantry @ Salvation Army - Montgomery Corps", "alternate_name": "", "description": "call in advance at : (301) 424-1130 )We will set up in the upper parking lot just before the Salvation Army and behind the Regal movie theater.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.mannafood.org/about/contact-manna/manna-food-distribution-sites/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "20021 Aircraft Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Germantown", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20874", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.186737, "longitude": -77.262571}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 424-1130", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Number of household members"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Pre-registration required by phone"}]}
